item.title: PlayStation Plus December 2025 Game Catalog Headliners Leak Early
item.content:encoded:
A new leak by a reliable source reveals the headliners for PlayStation Plus December 2025 Game Catalog additions, and it includes Assassin’s Creed Mirage and one more title.

We already know the free monthly PlayStation Plus games for December, including LEGO Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, and more. All players are now waiting for the last additions to the game catalog for the 2025 calendar year, and thanks to a new leak, we know 2 of those games.

Assassin’s Creed Mirage and Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty Coming to PlayStation Plus in December

The latest leak about PlayStation Plus’s December Game Catalog titles comes from a Dealabs report. The report reveals that Assassin’s Creed Mirage and Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty will be added to PlayStation Plus Game Catalog on December 16, 2025. Moreover, it seems that Soulcalibur III could be the new title for PlayStation Plus Premium/Deluxe members. The official announcement of PS Plus Game Catalog titles for December 2025 is expected on December 10 at 5:30 PM (French time).

For those unaware, Assassin’s Creed Mirage recently received a brand new DLC called Valley of Memory, which added 6 hours of additional content for players to check out, along with several noticeable gameplay improvements. Additionally, the developers recently announced that the title has reached 10 million players and will reach even more with its addition to PlayStation Plus.

In other news, PlayStation Wrapped 2025 is out, and here’s how you can access it. Additionally, Tencent has agreed to pause the promotion of Light of Motiram as the Horizon clone lawsuit with Sony continues. What are your thoughts on the two leaked headlines for PlayStation Plus December Game Catalog? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimensions DLC, making it easier to claim the Shiny Charm. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Midnight Chasers Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Midnight Chasers monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash and more.

Midnight Chasers is a Roblox game that immerses players in an exhilarating street racing experience where speed and skill determine a player’s success. Unlike most Roblox games, in Midnight Chasers, gamers drive supercars, hypercars, bikes or regular cars — weaving through traffic, cutting across highways, or just cruising and showing off their ride. The main objective of the game is to create the ultimate racing machine and test your driving prowess against friends or other players in high-speed competitions.

The more races you win, the better rewards you earn, which will help make your vehicle collection even more impressive. Because there’s a wide selection of vehicles, Midnight Chasers offers replay value. Thus, progression in Midnight Chasers revolves around collecting and using the game’s main currency: Cash. It’s the main resource within the game and allow players to purchase new vehicles and upgrades that can be used to enhance their racing capabilities. Thus, while these currencies can be earned during regular gameplay, redeeming codes will help give players a leg up.

Active Midnight Chasers Codes

  • ThanksFor580k – $30,000
  • ThxFor100Mil – $75,000

Expired Midnight Chasers Codes

  • ThxFor1MilMembers
  • GeneralKiko
  • ThanksFor550k

How To Redeem Midnight Chasers Codes

Use these steps to redeem all the active codes:

  1. Launch Midnight Chasers on Roblox
  2. Open the store, on the left side of the screen to bring up the shop menu
  3. Enter a code into the pop-up text box
  4. Press Claim and enjoy your rewards

How To Get More Midnight Chasers Codes

Midnight Chasers codes can usually be found on the game’s official Discord server, on the Roblox game page, and sometimes on the creator/developer’s social media pages. That includes Midnight In-Dev’s X account, as the team drops codes during game milestones and updates. However, keeping tabs on the various sources can be time-consuming, especially when there is no notification system in place when the codes expire.

Thus, we suggest bookmarking this guide in your browser, as we refresh it as soon as new Midnight Chasers codes are released and remove expired codes once they are no longer valid.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for The Forge, Merge And Fight, and Uma Racing. Join the Insider Gaming Discord community to stay up to date with the latest happenings in the gaming world.
